text: Jan Paweł Lenga (born 28 March 1950) is a Ukrainian Roman Catholic Archbishop Emeritus of Karaganda, Kazakhstan. == Early life == Jan Paweł Lenga was born on 28 March 1950 in Horodok, Ukraine. He became a priest on 28 May 1980. == Career == Lenga worked in Kazakhstan, where he served as a priest. In 1991, he was consecrated as the bishop of Karaganda. In 1999, he was appointed the Archbishop of Karaganda. On May 17, 2003, Jan Paweł Lenga received the title of Archbishop "ad personam". In 2011, he resigned as Archbishop and became Archbishop Emeritus of Karaganda. == References == == Other websites == * Catholic-Hierarchy Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Roman Catholic bishops Category:Ukrainian people
title: Jan Paweł Lenga
